002.text: Yes, that's me! You must be Lisa, correct?

003.text: Yes, that's me! Nice to finally meet you!

004.text: Likewise, Lisa. Just to let you know, I have a bit of an... eccentric taste. I appreciate the finer things in life, and that includes my company.

005.text: I hope you won't find it too rude, but if I feel our interests don't align, I have a habit of cutting the meeting short. I believe in not wasting anyone's time, you see.

006.text: I see, well, I'm sure we'll have plenty to talk about!

007.text: Well, I thought it might be fun to have our date here. Plus, there's a bit of a selfish reason...

008.text: Oh? And what might that be?

009.text: Well... there's this game I've been trying to beat for ages, but I can't seem to do it!

010.text: I was thinkin... maybe you could try?
